achievements.title: Downward Spiral
achievements.desc: Once drawn inside this inky whirlpool, you will find yourself sinking faster than the Titanic.

achievements.title: Revelations (18:14)
achievements.desc: You've developed quite the appetite. Devouring fifty chapters a day doesn't seem challenging to you anymore.

achievements.title: Voluntary Confinement
achievements.desc: Every title you read brings you closer to your self.

achievements.title: Apocryphal Sanctuary
achievements.desc: You've journeyed through hell and heaven, and learned much in your wanderings.
